alfredsnippet.snippet:
"If I had to bet, I'd bet the human species will become extinct as a result of its own stupidity. But in the meantime, buy yourself a telescope and look at the stars. That will at least teach you not to sweat the small stuff. And all human affairs, compared with the universe, are small stuff."

- Charley Reese
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - All Human Affairs, Compard with the Universe, Are Small Stuff
